WorkItem.ClosedComment: The form is now instanciate after the settings upgrade.
WorkItem.Description: Each time WPP is upgrade, when going to "Manage Catalogs Subscriptions", the form is in English. This happen only one time until the next upgrade.
WorkItem.Summary: "Manage Catalogs Subscription" form is in English

Comments.Message: This happen because the form is instanciate before WPP performe an upgrade of the previous settings.
